name: Neant
text: Then... It's doubt's turnto take hold of you

name: Neant
text: If your very own departure brought you there, then what did you experience in life ?

name: Neant
text: When did your living end, and your ending start ?

name: Neant
text: Was it when your friend left ?

name: Neant
text: Was it in the despair of your search ?

name: Neant
text: Or was it at the heart of all your problems, which you were supposed to face here ?

name: Neant
text: Which of these opportunities to take the final step was the right one for you ?
